<core:FragmentDefinition
   xmlns="sap.m"
   xmlns:f="sap.ui.layout.form"
      xmlns:l="sap.ui.layout"
   xmlns:core="sap.ui.core">
   <Popover
      class="myCustomPopover"
      id="npmPopover"
      placement="Bottom"
      title="Eye Able Assistent"
      contentWidth="300px">
      <content>
         <List
            id="modulesList"
            items="{modules>/items}"
            showSeparators="None"
            backgroundDesign="Transparent">
            <items>
               <CustomListItem>
                  <content>
                     <Panel
                        expandable="{modules>expandable}"
                        backgroundDesign="Transparent"
                        expanded="false"
                        width="auto">
                        <headerToolbar>
                           <OverflowToolbar press=".onPanelHeaderPress">
                              <core:Icon src="{modules>icon}" />
                              <Title text="{modules>name}" />
                           </OverflowToolbar>
                        </headerToolbar>
                        <content>

                              <f:SimpleForm layout="ResponsiveGridLayout" visible="{= ${modules>name} === 'Schriftgröße' }">
                           <l:VerticalLayout class="sapUiSmallMargin">
                              <Text text="Passen Sie die Schriftgröße der gesamten Webseite an." class="sapUiTinyMarginBottom"/>
                              <Toolbar>
                                 <Button icon="sap-icon://zoom-out" text="Verkleinern" press="onDecreaseFontSize" />
                                 <ToolbarSpacer/>
                                 <Button icon="sap-icon://zoom-in" text="Vergrößern" press="onIncreaseFontSize" />
                              </Toolbar>
                           </l:VerticalLayout>
                        </f:SimpleForm>
                           <Text
                              visible="{modules>expandable}"
                              text="Buraya {modules>name} ile ilgili detaylı ayarlar veya açıklamalar gelecek."
                           />
                        </content>
                     </Panel>
                  </content>
               </CustomListItem>
            </items>
         </List>
      </content>
      <footer>
         <Toolbar>
            <ToolbarSpacer />
            <Button
               id="closePopoverButton"
               text="Schließen" />
         </Toolbar>
      </footer>
   </Popover>
</core:FragmentDefinition>
